00012 #ifndef INV_GEN_H_
00013 #define INV_GEN_H_

00015 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00016  * Base class template for invariant mass generators by the inversion method.  *
00017  * The base class carries the derived type as the first template parameter     *
00018  * (CRTP). The derived type should provide implementations of the generated    *
00019  * density, its cumulant and the inverse of the cumulant.                      *
00020  *                                                                             *
00021  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00022 
00023 #include <Camgen/logging.h>
00024 #include <Camgen/s_gen.h>
00025 #include <Camgen/s_int.h>
00026 
00027 namespace Camorra
00028 {
00030 
00031     template<class value_t,class rng_t,class sub_type>class inversion_s_generator: public s_generator<value_t,rng_t>
00032     {
00033         friend class s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>;
00034         typedef s_generator<value_t,rng_t> base_type;
00035 
00036         public:
00037 
00038             /* Type definitions: */
00039 
00040             typedef value_t value_type;
00041             typedef rng_t rn_engine;
00042             typedef random_number_stream<value_type,rng_t> rn_stream;
00043 
00044             /* Public constructors: */
00045             /*----------------------*/
00046 
00048 
00049             inversion_s_generator(){}
00050 
00052 
00053             inversion_s_generator(value_type* inv_mass_):base_type(inv_mass_){}
00054 
00056 
00057             inversion_s_generator(const inversion_s_generator<value_t,rng_t,sub_type>& other):s_generator<value_t,rng_t>(other),min_cumulant(other.min_cumulant),max_cumulant(other.max_cumulant),min_cumulant_lim(other.min_cumulant_lim),max_cumulant_lim(other.max_cumulant_lim){}
00058 
00059             /* Public modifiers: */
00060             /*-------------------*/
00061 
00063 
00064             bool refresh_s_min()
00065             {
00066                 min_cumulant=(this->s_min()==-std::numeric_limits<value_t>::infinity())?min_cumulant_lim:static_cast<const sub_type*>(this)->cdf(this->s_min());
00067                 refresh_norm();
00068                 return this->normalisable();
00069             }
00070 
00072 
00073             bool refresh_s_max()
00074             {
00075                 max_cumulant=(this->s_max()==std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity())?max_cumulant_lim:static_cast<const sub_type*>(this)->cdf(this->s_max());
00076                 refresh_norm();
00077                 return this->normalisable();
00078             }
00079 
00080             /* Public const methods: */
00081             /*-----------------------*/
00082 
00084 
00085             virtual inversion_s_generator<value_t,rng_t,sub_type>* clone() const
00086             {
00087                 return static_cast<inversion_s_generator<value_t,rng_t,sub_type>*>(new sub_type(*static_cast<const sub_type*>(this)));
00088             }
00089 
00091 
00092             value_type map(const value_type& r) const
00093             {
00094 //              return static_cast<const sub_type*>(this)->inverse_cdf(std::abs(max_cumulant-min_cumulant)*r+std::min(min_cumulant,max_cumulant));
00095                 return static_cast<const sub_type*>(this)->inverse_cdf((max_cumulant-min_cumulant)*r+min_cumulant);
00096             }
00097 
00099 
00100             value_type inverse_map(const value_type& s) const
00101             {
00102 //              return (static_cast<const sub_type*>(this)->cdf(s)-std::min(min_cumulant,max_cumulant))/std::abs(max_cumulant-min_cumulant);
00103                 return (static_cast<const sub_type*>(this)->cdf(s)-min_cumulant)/(max_cumulant-min_cumulant);
00104             }
00105 
00107             
00108             virtual value_type integrate_with(const s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00109             {
00110                 return gen->integrate_with(this,sqrts);
00111             }
00112             virtual value_type integrate_with(const BW_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00113             {
00114                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::template integrate<sub_type>(gen,this,sqrts);
00115             }
00116             virtual value_type integrate_with(const pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00117             {
00118                 typedef pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t> gen_t2;
00119                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::template integrate<sub_type,gen_t2>(this,static_cast<const inversion_s_generator<value_t,rng_t,gen_t2>*>(gen),sqrts);
00120             }
00121             virtual value_type integrate_with(const uni_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00122             {
00123                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::template integrate<sub_type>(gen,this,sqrts);
00124             }
00125             virtual value_type integrate_with(const Dd_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00126             {
00127                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::template integrate<sub_type>(this,gen,sqrts);
00128             }
00129 
00130         protected:
00131 
00133 
00134             value_type min_cumulant,max_cumulant;
00135 
00137 
00138             value_type min_cumulant_lim,max_cumulant_lim;
00139 
00141 
00142             virtual void refresh_norm()
00143             {
00144                 this->norm=std::abs(max_cumulant-min_cumulant);
00145             }
00146 
00148 
00149             value_type get_fast_weight() const
00150             {
00151                 return this->norm/static_cast<const sub_type*>(this)->pdf(this->s());
00152             }
00153     };
00154 }
